column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Service: The guy who was serving our party was pretty cool. He was quick to take orders from all of us (in the end
column2: only nine people showed up) and there was no issues in splitting the check. The only downside was when the food was coming out
column3: they were kind of messed up in delivering the right appetizers to the right person. However
column4: all the ramen bowls were brought out to the right people.
